post.author: Admin
post.title: Bakery for Marching Band Concert
post.description:
Dear Sophomore Band Families:
Just a friendly reminder. We are asking all Sophomore Band Families
post.content:
Dear Sophomore Band Families:

Just a friendly reminder. We are asking all Sophomore Band Families to bring store bought desserts with NO peanuts to the Marching Band Concert on November 4th. After the concert we are hoping all the band members and their families will enjoy bakery and beverages, but CURRENTLY LESS THAN HALF THE SOPHOMORE BAND FAMILIES HAVE SIGNED UP TO DONATE and there will not be enough bakery for everyone to enjoy!

Please sign up for a specific dessert here.

Please send your dessert with your band student and have them drop it off on November 4th in Cafeteria I (next to PAC) before they go to practice. Please put your last name on the dessert. NO dessert should be dropped off in the band room. Someone will be in Cafeteria I to take the dessert.

If you have any questions please contact Helen Kelly at alandhelenkelly@cox.net or (440) 746-9048.

Thanks,

Helen Kelly
Hospitality Committee
